nodes.text: "The First Lesson" is a short story from the point of view of Yoda that was published in the 2020 anthology book From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back. It was written by Jim Zub.
Zub originally pitched to write his story from the point of view of the dragonsnake that tried to swallow R2-D2 before spitting him out.
